heading: HR00509
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HUMAN RIGHTS TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE KILLING OF 23-YEAR-OLD KIM LESTER RAMOS IN MARIKINA CITY BY A POLICE OFFICER ON OCTOBER 5, 2019, AND RECOMMEND MEASURES TO PUT AN END TO DRUG-RELATED EXTRAJUDICIAL KILLINGS
